historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 802 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-1208.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: If dissolution of a statutory trust is authorized under § 29-1208.01, the trust shall deliver to the Mayor for filing articles of dissolution setting forth the:
Except as otherwise provided in § 29-102.03, a statutory trust is dissolved when articles of dissolution that comply with subsection (a) of this section, are filed by the Mayor.
